div.p: A footnote followsMy footnote. Clicking on the footnote number should bring us back to the footnote mark above, whatever the display. here. It should bear the same number in all displays.
Spaces before notes are removed. The following should thus have the same display: foo Hellobar fooHellobar
Spaces after notes are preserved, thus: fooHello bar.
But no spaces are added after notes: fooHellobar.
